content:
Call starting soon (10 am ET): https://us02web.zoom.us/j/5328571160
Minutes from last time: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PC/IPA+2022-02-09
Agenda for today: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PC/IPA+2022-02-16
I'm late, but in the lobby now.
@Vassil Peytchev @Isaac Vetter are you still on the call?

Can someone point me to the call details for the conference call on which we do voting for IPA issues? Today's call which was a triage call was great but there was one issue that I wanted to join the broader discussion for.

We don't have a set PC call for voting purposes - when there is something to vote, we announce which call it would be. Our usual target is to use the Clinicians on FHIR call on Tuesdays 5 pm Eastern Time. For some reason I cannot find that call on the HL7 calendar, but the coordinates are on the Confluence page at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PC/Patient+Care
OK -- if there's a specific time/call where we can make a decision on FHIR-35350, I'd very much like to participate.
